amendment.description: Amendment makes technical changes to the bill to reflect enactment of the Commodities Futures Modernization Act of 2000.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 4 printed in H. Rept. 107-4 to reflect changes made by passage of the Commodity Futures Modernization Act and update definitions to reflect current and developing market practices.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Oxley amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
